definition: to tie/bind or fasten together/to kidnap

sentences.english: She returns not to untie her but just to add black tape to her gag and to put her into a hogtie.
sentences.chinese: 她返回不要解开她只是添加黑胶带呕吐，把她捆绑。

sentences.english: He was holding one end of a ribbon of crepe paper tied to a post.
sentences.chinese: 他拿着一个完一个丝带的绉纸捆绑到一个职位。

sentences.english: What's more, it will be bundled with MSI graphics cards when the software releases.
sentences.chinese: 什么的，它会被捆绑微星绘图卡时，软件版本。

sentences.english: Everything you need bundled into one simple, tidy, portable package.
sentences.chinese: 你需要的一切捆绑成一个简单，整齐，便携包。

sentences.english: Tell me how you can be tied.
sentences.chinese: 求你告诉我，当用何法捆绑你。

sentences.english: It happened shortly after this that the Lion was caught by some hunters, who bound him by strong ropes to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 后来狮子被几个猎人捉住，用粗绳捆绑倒在地上。

sentences.english: They tie the hands and legs of suspects like roasted chickens.
sentences.chinese: 他们把嫌疑犯的手脚捆绑起来，就像烤鸡那样。

sentences.english: When fracture of the wounded lower limbs is secured, limbs wants curved move to show bend ancon unbend to bind.
sentences.chinese: 伤员下肢骨折固定时，肢体要弯着呈屈肘状伸直捆绑。

sentences.english: The binder system about cationic guar gum is most active field of research.
sentences.chinese: 阳离子瓜尔胶的新式捆绑系统是研究的热点。

sentences.english: Boxes and crates shall be steel strapped.
sentences.chinese: 木箱和板条箱应该用钢带捆绑。

sentences.english: So, finally we see him being tided on the pillar.
sentences.chinese: 然后我们终于看著他被捆绑。

sentences.english: They bound him, holding him before Ea.
sentences.chinese: 于是他们将他捆绑起来，押送到Ea跟前。

sentences.english: It seems as if so much of its self-esteem is tied up in gold.
sentences.chinese: 似乎把它的自尊和金牌捆绑起来。

sentences.english: She gets hogtied again with rope and then I wrap her head with electrical tape.
sentences.chinese: 再次与她捆绑的绳子，然后我用绝缘胶带包裹她的头。

sentences.english: It's cheaper to buy software bundled with a PC than separately.
sentences.chinese: 购买和个人锃电脑一起捆绑销售的软件要比单买便宜。

sentences.english: Events easily tied to server-side code
sentences.chinese: 事件容易捆绑到服务器端代码。

definition: to nail securely/to execute by means of impalement/to crucify
to cut off/to chop sth in half
to be in a tangle/to nag
to tether/to tie up/(fig.) to restrict/to keep a hold on
